title: Strange graphics bug
content: M1 Macbook Air. Tried fresh install, safe mode, etc. Still getting weird white boxes everywhere. Please help
creator: liam10

title: Firefox drawing a white bar over the window
content: I have a dual monitor setup, one above the other with a slight offset, and when I use Firefox on the bottom monitor it draws a small white stripe above the window and blocks a bit off the top monitor's lower edge. Not a huge problem, but it's quite annoying. Any help would be very much appreciated.
creator: gabobustamante1

title: Removing Total Adblock.
content:
On the Total Adblock site it gives these directions for removing the program: "Mozilla Firefox Uninstalling Adblock from your Mozilla Firefox browser is very simple and can be done within a few clicks. Go to the Extensions Page on Mozilla Firefox copy this link into the address bar of your browser:about:addons 

Find Total Adblock within your plugins . Click the 3 Dots. Click Remove."

I do not know where the "extensions page" is. Nor where to find it. While I have been using personal computers for decades, I am still a complete beginner when it comes to any technical jargon. If someone would kindly give me directions in English about getting rid of this annoying extension/program? I would deeply appreciate it.
creator: MozSupIsCrap

title: Firefox Browser Won't Load Background Images
content:
Starting earlier this week my Firefox suddenly stopped being able to load background images. Every website I visit looks very strange and often is unusable. I'm running Mac 10.14.6. Tried several things including uninstall and reinstalling Firefox and no difference.

Attached are screenshots of espn.com in Safari where you can see the gray bar at the top and box around the dropdown window background. This is happening on EVERY website. Help!
creator: afimovieproducer
